title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 700.9 - Professional service costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 700.9 - Professional service costs

State Regulations

Costs of legal, accounting and consulting services, and
related costs incurred in connection with an adjudicatory proceeding under this

Part are not allowable costs under CSBG entitlement funds received by the
grantee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
700.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
